description:
This one of the friends of Castlegar trails.  The trail has about 360 of vertical over 3.2 km one way. This trail is quite steep in some sections. 
Experienced hikers only. Use extreme caution and be sure of your footing. The view is great at the top.
directions:
Access from the Brilliant Substation parking lot. See 
http://www.friendsoftrails.org/pages/Brilliant_Overlook_Access_Description.html
title: Brilliant Overlook
